Numbers Town - GBA Edition

Pokemon FireRed with integrated math challenges from Supabase

ðŸ’¡ Interactive Learning: NPCs will trigger math questions that pause the game!

How It Works

ðŸŽ® Playing the Game

Play Pokemon FireRed normally using keyboard controls (Arrow keys, Z/X for A/B).

ðŸ“š Numbers Town NPCs

When you interact with certain NPCs in the region, they will trigger a math question:

  1. The game automatically pauses
  2. A question overlay appears from your Supabase database
  3. Answer correctly to continue the battle
  4. Wrong answers send you back to try again

ðŸ”§ ROM Hacking Setup

To enable this feature, you need to modify the ROM using XSE (eXtreme Script Editor):

writebytetooffset 0x0203FFFF 0x01
waitstate
compare LASTRESULT 0x1
if 0x1 goto @battle

âœ¨ Features

  • Real-time memory watching (0x0203FFFF)
  • Automatic game pause/resume
  • Questions fetched from your Supabase database
  • Support for Math, Analytical, and English questions
  • Clean UI overlay with instant feedback
